entries.description: Amazon Q Feature Dev: display limit reached error message
Amazon Q chat: `@workspace` command shown in all tab types
Chat container exceeds width of container
amazon q inline: skip indexing when no workspace folders are found
file details and name unneccessary cropping
Amazon Q /dev: update diff window behavior after a change is accepted
Code Transform: Enable support for Java 17 projects.
Notifications: Support for delivering critical alerts and product updates
Retrieve and display a customization name when a customization is overridden in an AB test
Feature(Amazon Q Code Transformation): support conversions of embedded SQL from Oracle to PostgreSQL
